discussion.author: gdalle
discussion.text:
[noblock]

Hi, thank you for the contribution!
Your package name is rather short and noninformative for someone who isn't from your field. How about AtomicStructureXSF.jl?

discussion.author: azadoks
discussion.text: Sorry about that! I've changed the name to `XCrySDenStructureFormat.jl`; should the PR be closed so that I can call the registrator bot on the commit where I've changed the name?
